scripts.reset-all: npm run reset-sessions && npm run reset-migrations && npm run reset-db
scripts.reset-db: rm -f pnpd_data/pnpd.db && touch pnpd_data/pnpd.db && rm -f pnpd_data/pnpd.db-wal && rm -f pnpd_data/pnpd.db-shm
scripts.reset-migrations: rm -r pnpd_data/migrations && sqlite3 pnpd_data/pnpd.db "DROP TABLE knex_migrations; DROP TABLE knex_migrations_lock;"
scripts.build: npx parcel build index.js && npm run build-cleanup
